de.bioforscher.singa.structure.model.interfaces

Interface LeafSubstructureContainer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AtomContainer
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Chain, Model, Structure
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MmtfChain, MmtfModel, MmtfStructure, OakChain, OakModel, OakStructure, StructuralMotif

    public interface LeafSubstructureContainer
extends AtomContainer
    Everything that contains leaf substructures. Provides default methods to retrieve AminoAcids, Nucleotides, and Ligands.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllLeafSubstructures

        java.util.List<LeafSubstructure<?>> getAllLeafSubstructures()
        Returns all LeafSubstructures.
        Returns:
        All LeafSubstructures.

      • getLeafSubstructure

        java.util.Optional<LeafSubstructure<?>> getLeafSubstructure(LeafIdentifier leafIdentifier)
        Returns an Optional of the LeafSubstructure with the given identifier. If no LeafSubstructure with the identifier could be found, an empty optional is returned.
        Parameters:
        leafIdentifier - The identifier of the leaf.
        Returns:
        An Optional encapsulating the LeafSubstructure.

      • getFirstLeafSubstructure

        LeafSubstructure<?> getFirstLeafSubstructure()

      • removeLeafSubstructure

        boolean removeLeafSubstructure(LeafIdentifier leafIdentifier)
        Removes a LeafSubstructure from this container.
        Parameters:
        leafIdentifier - The identifier of the leaf.
        Returns:
        True if the LeafSubstructure was removed.

      • removeLeafSubstructure

        default boolean removeLeafSubstructure(LeafSubstructure leafSubstructure)

      • removeLeafSubstructuresNotRelevantFor

        default void removeLeafSubstructuresNotRelevantFor(LeafSubstructureContainer leafSubstructuresToKeep)
        Removes all LeafSubstructures from this container that are not referenced in the given LeafSubstructureContainer. Basically all LeafSubstructures are removed that do not match any of the given containers families. This method also keeps exchangeable families if any are defined.
        Parameters:
        leafSubstructuresToKeep - The leaf structures that are kept.

      • getNumberOfLeafSubstructures

        default int getNumberOfLeafSubstructures()

      • getAminoAcid

        default java.util.Optional<AminoAcid> getAminoAcid(LeafIdentifier leafIdentifier)
        Returns an Optional of the AminoAcid with the given identifier. If no LeafSubstructure with the identifier could be found or the LeafSubstructure is no AminoAcid, an empty optional is returned.
        Parameters:
        leafIdentifier - The identifier of the amino acid.
        Returns:
        An Optional encapsulating the AminoAcid.
